name: Social Media Application
desc: Developed a fully functional social media application using the MERN. The application includes key features such as user authentication, profile creation, posting updates, liking and commenting on posts, real-time notifications, and a chat system.

name: Calender
desc: Developed an interactive calendar application using React with the following    features like Calendar View, Adding, editing, Deleting and filtering Event using REACT

name: Amazon Clone
desc: Engineered a static webpage replicating Amazonâ€™s interface using HTML and CSS. Focused on the layout, design, and responsiveness to create a visually similar experience to the actual Amazon website.

name: To-Do List
desc: Created a to-do list application using React, incorporating features for adding, deleting, and modifying tasks. Implemented state management with hooks and designed an intuitive user interface to enhance user experience.

name: Travel Website
desc: Currently working on the development of a travel enthusiast website enabling users to search and discover the best places to visit using React. The project involves integrating APIs for fetching travel data, and implementing search and filter functionalities to provide users with relevant information.

name: Space Website
desc: Developed a responsive space-related content website (only frontend), enabling users to learn about the latest news in the domain of space using React. Focused on creating a dynamic UI with modern design principles and ensuring compatibility across different devices.

name: Human Following Robot
desc: Designed and developed a human-following robot utilizing Arduino technology. Implemented sensors and control algorithms to enable the robot to detect and follow a human target, ensuring smooth and accurate movement.

name: Processor Architecture
desc: Designed a complete processor using Verilog. Worked on the architecture design, coding, and simulation to ensure proper functionality. The project involved understanding digital logic, pipelining, and instruction set architecture.
